summary: Diff implements frontend-side month/year isolation in the Daily Tracking grid (filtering records by selected month/year and using month/year-scoped lookup keys) and clears records during month switches to avoid showing stale data while fetching. Backend changes relevant to month-specific persistence/querying cannot be verified from the truncated backend diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Persist and reload completion state/amounts per selected month/year in the backend so reloading and switching months shows only that month’s saved data (no cross-month bleed).
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend now filters records by selected month/year, but the diff summary does not show (due to truncation / missing relevant sections) that backend storage and month/year-scoped querying were updated/verified to ensure persisted separation across months and correct reload behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer copy/link change referencing “© 2026. Built with love using caffeine.ai”.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; unrelated to month-separated daily tracking behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Deterministic profile loading/isFetched gating behavior described/implemented in the user profile query hook.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ (scope is daily tracking month separation/loading behavior).
